amendment.description: To strike "as a fundamental guide on which to base their planning," provision.

vote.text: Amendment SA 2693 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 2693 proposed by Senator Frist for Senator Lugar. (consideration: CR S14410; text: CR S14410) To strike "as a fundamental guide on which to base their planning," provision.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 2693 proposed by Senator Frist for Senator Lugar.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 2693 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
